tool_description: API to access product and shipping information from Gearbest
name: Gearbest
title: Gearbest

api_list.name: /categories
/get_shipping
/get_products_from_category
/get_product
/get_top_searches
/search
/get_reviews

required_parameters.name: sku
required_parameters.description: Found under 'data_layer' > 'goods' > 'sku' in result of get_product

required_parameters.name: spu
required_parameters.description: Found under 'good_info' > 'goodsSpu' in result of get_product
